description: Trains are great logistics tools. They can /6/automatically carry/6/ /b/entities/b/, /b/items/b/, and /b/fluids/b/ long distances with good speed.

Lay some /b/Train Tracks,/b/ place down a /b/Train Station/b/, put on a /b/Train Controler/b/ and get moving. Trains /6/do not require fuel/6/, but will move /6/much faster with some/6/ placed anywhere on the vehicle.
A /b/Train Schedule/b/ and an /b/entity/b/ in the driver's seat can /6/automatically drive/6/ the train.
